a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b) if a > b else 0)


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (b - a))


a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
if a - b > c:
    print(0)
else:
    print(c - (a - b))
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))
#!/usr/bin/env python3

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a, end='')
else:
    print(0, end='')


# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2, c = bottle 3
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(c - (a - b))

#!/usr/bin/env python3

# a = bottle 1, b = bottle 2
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

if b + c > a:
    print(b + c - a)
else:
    print(0)

a, b, c = map(int, input().split())

print(c - (a - b))
